description: Plans to scrap several scheduled bus services between Jurby and Ramsey are dropped.
title: U-turn over plans to cut Isle of Man bus services
title_page: U-turn over plans to cut Isle of Man bus services - BBC News
maintext: Many of the current scheduled Bus Vannin services were re-introduced in November last year after concerns that "more cost-effective" on-demand minibuses, to be booked 24-hours in advance, could leave people stranded.
